posts.post_content:
We are the world's premiere collector of high grade baseball
type cards. We are aggressively buying a select number of 
"rate" issues for our museum quality collection.

If you provide us with a lead that results in a purchase, we will
pay you a referral fee as follows

1. Card price up to $3000 $150
2. Card price above $3000 $300

We are only interested in referrals on items which do not appear on EBAY and/or in baseball auction. No referral fees will be paid for these items.

Our Want List can be found below.
Please write in confidence to 

Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List
[url]bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com[/url]


Please write in confidence, with scan to [url]bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com[/url]
Bruce Dorskind America’s Toughest Want List
